title: Food Waste Information at University of Iowa Hospitals and Clinics
description: The University of Iowa Hospitals and Clinics tracked food waste from December 2011 to November 2012, recording the number of servings prepared, sold, and lost in various dining areas. The data shows a significant amount of food waste, with over 355,000 servings lost across all retail areas.
keywords: University of Iowa Hospitals and Clinics
